banner.guestTitle: Unlock extra features with an account
banner.guestDescription: You can use all tools without an account. Sign in to enable cloud-synced sets, cross-set insights, and integrations with your SFDataHub profile.
banner.accountComingSoon: These features are in development and will roll out gradually.
banner.featureSetComparison: Compare your sets to find the best setups.
banner.featureIntegration: Link your sets with player profiles, guilds, and other modules.
banner.featureCloudSync: Sync your sets across devices with your SFDataHub account.

descriptions.dungeonPause: Dummy view for dungeon pause tools.

sets.importErrorInvalid: This file does not contain a valid tools set.
sets.importErrorMaxReached: You already use the maximum of 3 sets. Delete one before importing a new one.
sets.deleteConfirmText: This will remove the set from your browser and free up a slot. Export it first if you want a backup.
sets.deleteLastForbidden: You need at least one set. Create a new one before deleting this.
sets.renamePlaceholder: Enter a name for this set

sync.error: Could not save your changes. Please try again.
